abstract: J M Smucker expects modest decline in net sales in quarter ending in April but says coffee business should recover as bean prices stabilize.
lead_paragraph: J. M. Smucker says it expects bean prices to stabilize and is introducing smaller Folgers cans to recover customers it lost after raising prices.

headline.main: Smucker Predicts Rebound in Coffee Business
headline.print_headline: Smucker Predicts Rebound in Coffee Business

snippet: J. M. Smucker says it expects bean prices to stabilize and is introducing smaller Folgers cans to recover customers it lost after raising prices.
